edu.umn.se.trap.rules
Interface TRAPRule

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddOtherExpenses, AddTransportationExpenses, AlcoholOnlyAllowedUnderNonSponsored, BaggageExpenses, BusinessLogicRule, DateValidator, DoDForeignExpenseRestriction, DoDMealRestrictions, DomesticCarRental, EmailAddressValidator, FamilyMemberExpensesNotAllowed, FinalizeRule, FindDestinations, ForeignGrantsNoDomesticTravel, GrantApproverName, GrantPercentSumTo100, IncidentalPerDiem, InputValidationRule, InternetOnlyUnderNonSponsoredGrants, LodgingPerDiem, MealPerDiem, NIHGrantRestrictions, NoExportGrantsOnlyForUSCitizens, OneOrMoreGrantsAllValid, OnlyOneCheckedLuggage, OtherExpenseDateValidator, PerDayCarExpenses, PhoneNumberValidator, TransportationDateValidator, TransportationMileageExpenses, USCarriersOnly
public interface TRAPRule

The interface that all rules in the TRAP system must implement in-order for the rule registry to communicate with them.

Author:
andrewh

Method Summary
 void checkRule(ReimbursementApp app)
          Check the logic associated with this rule.
 

Method Detail

checkRule

void checkRule(ReimbursementApp app)
               throws TRAPException
Check the logic associated with this rule.

Parameters:
app - - The ReimbursementApp object that has all information required to process an application.
Throws:
TRAPException - - When a problem occurs during the checking/processing of the rule.
